explains: adj. 稀少的，稀疏的；简朴的

sentences.en: Vegetation becomes sparse higher up the mountains.
sentences.cn: 山上越高的地方植物越稀少。

sentences.en: Many slopes are rock fields with sparse vegetation.
sentences.cn: 许多山坡都是植被稀疏的岩石地。

sentences.en: The sparse line of spectators noticed nothing unusual.
sentences.cn: 稀稀疏疏的一排观众并没注意到什么特别之处。
